name: SnakeDroid
description:
GameJam submission for the BuddyUp GameJam Winter 2022.

Story:

A huge space battle is unfolding in the orbit of Planet Z’mija, this primitive planet is the home of a race called Slange.

As the battle in space unfolds the destroyed ships start crashing in the lush forests of planet Z’mija. Our hero Sssilvio, an inventive member of the Slange, is exploring the forest looking for food and supplies to create new tech to help his people develop. He sees a huge structure in flames crash not far from his location and decides to go check it out.

As he enters this structure he stumbles across an intact mech. Since he is a mechanic himself he decides to check it out. Upon entering the cockpit the machine activates and recognises Sssilvio as its master. Sssilvio, now in possession of the mech decides to further investigate the ship wreck now protected by this new mech.

Gameplay:

The player must combine the abilities of the mech and Sssilvio to advance forward and unravel the reason for this interstellar war and why it is fought near planet Z’mija.

Note: This is a work in progress, any bugs will be addressed after submission.
